public static org.ietf.jgss.GSSCredential delegateProxyFromMyProxyServer(java.lang.String MYPROXY_SERVER,
                                                                         int MYPROXY_PORT,
                                                                         java.lang.String MYPROXY_USER_ACCOUNT,
                                                                         java.lang.String MYPROXY_PASSPHRASE,
                                                                         int MYPROXY_PROXYLIFETIME,
                                                                         org.ogf.saga.context.Context context)
                                                                  throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                         org.ietf.jgss.GSSException,
                                                                         org.globus.myproxy.MyProxyException,
                                                                         java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                                         MissingConfigurationException
Retrieve credentials from a MyProxy Server

Parameters:
MYPROXY_SERVER - Hostname of the MyProxy Server to contact.
MYPROXY_PORT - The MyProxy Server port on which the server is listening.
MYPROXY_USER_ACCOUNT - The user account on the MyProxy Server.
MYPROXY_PROXYLIFETIME - The life time for the user proxy.
MYPROXY_FILE - The file containing the user proxy.
USERID - The Unix ID for the user.
Throws:
IOException
MissingConfigurationException
org.ietf.jgss.GSSException
org.globus.myproxy.MyProxyException
java.io.FileNotFoundException
